issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
@scpeters OK, that is odd.  Using the setup you describe but with local IP addresses, everything works fine as long as the sim machine and remote machine are on the same local network. Been doing that for a long time.  The issue here is making it work on a cloud computer.

But when I try to duplicate your setup by putting a global IP address as ROS_IP in the sim machine, then different terminals on the sim machine cannot see ROS topics.  Yet you were able to get this to go over a nonlocal network?  That is great news!  Could we try that?  If you provide the IP address of the remote computer, I can try to see the world frame there.
